name: DungeonCubism
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

You play as a cube trying to conquer a dungeon infested with evil purple cubes. Your goal is to defeat the Mother Horde to rid of the purple cubes once and for all. However, the gate that will take you to to your goal is broken and now you must explore the dungeon to collect the three travel fragments to fix the gate and defeat the Mother Horde.

CONTROLS:
W/A or left/right arrows - move
Space - jump
Mouse - aim
Left-click - shoot
Esc - Bring up pause menu

NOTE: If the game does not work properly in browser please download it.
